Package com.mainPack.gameLevel

Class Levels

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mainPack.gameLevel.Levels
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LevelStructure
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlankLevel, FirstLevel, SecondLevel
    public abstract class Levels
extends java.lang.Object
implements LevelStructure
    Abstract class which contains the implementation of levels. Classes which extend Levels can use this class or override methods to create new levels

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createTimer()
      Sets the score in the top left and the frogger lives in the bottom left, once the getAnimal().getStop is true, the game is ended and the high scores are displayed to the user.

      com.mainPack.World.MyStage getBackground()
      Returns the background
      javafx.animation.AnimationTimer getTimer()
      Returns timer
      void instantiateBackground()
      Sets the new background based on the primaryStage, creates a new Scene to add the background to and displays the number of frogger lives to begin with.
      void newlevel()
      Sets the contents of the new level by calling the functions for setting Obstacles logs turtles etc as well as the music and score

      Set the animal to the animal passed into the function parameters
      void setBackground​(com.mainPack.World.MyStage background)

      Sets the Ends of the game by creating multiple end objects and adds them to the background

      Instantiates a new frog and adds it to the background

      Sets the score value for the number of frogger lives at the bottom of the screen based on the number of lives left

      Alters the users score in the top left by shifting the score depending on the number of digits e.g.

      void setWetTurtle()
      Sets the Wet Turtles that will be present in the game by using the FactoryMoving class to create the objects.
      void start()
      This function plays the music in the background of the game and creates a new timer for the duration of the game till the game ends
      void stop()
      Stops the timer running
